programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire – the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success – even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!(n)

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!(n)

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Hippo Has No Hair - You see there was a time when Hippo did have hair… lots of hair! She was always harumphingly hot. Then one hot night while Hippo was sleeping a spark from the fire caught the end of her hairy tail! Hippo was on fire! She ran through the bush until SPLOSH! Hippo jumped in the waterhole. And from that day on Hippo stayed in the cool waters without a single hair on her hide. Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The Case Of The Hiding Pirates - Everyone is excited about singing sea shanties in the big Pirate Party in Toyland. But when Scurvy the Parrot arrives at Toy Green all on his own Noddy soon realises that the pirates are missing. Where can they have gone? Noddy uses his best investigating skills of tracking, listening, looking and thinking to follow the clues and find out what's happened to the pirates - not helped by a loudly squawking Scurvy! When he discovers that the pirates have lost their voices from over-practising their new sea shanty, Noddy comes up with an idea for how Scurvy's loud voice can help save the day. Clever Noddy!(n)

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Music Player - Noddy's new music player starts a craze for the latest dance, the Toy Twist. He decides to have a big dance party that night! All his friends are excited apart from Smartysaurus, who can't dance. When the music player goes missing, Noddy must use all his investigative skills of listening, looking and following clues on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to find out who has taken the music player and why. Eventually he realises that Smartysaurus borrowed the game so that she could practise the Toy Twist – but it's no good! She still can't master it! Noddy shows her how her own special Dinosaur Dance can make everyone's Toy Twist extra specially fun! Well done Noddy!(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: What'S Happened To Chloe The Caterpillar? - Jess wants to introduce Willow to his new friend, Chloe the caterpillar. But where's Chloe gone? He searches for her in all the places she might be, where he's visited her before, where there might be juicey leaves she'd like to eat but it's not until a butterfly breaks out of a little Chloe-shaped-sack that Jess realises that Chloe's just changed!(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: When Will My Coloured Stripes Come Back? - Jess is playing puddle jumping, dodging the rain to have fun on a gloomy day when suddenly, just as the rain's stopping, the sun comes out and at the same time he sees a beautiful rainbow in the sky. He's desperate to show his friends, and it's not until he works out you need sunshine and rain at the same time to make a rainbow that he can show his friends the beautiful coloured shape in the sky.(n)

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T
programme.desc: No Can Do / Adopt-A-Toad - Chet is determined to open a giant can of tomato juice lands in town and Turbo worries that Chet is becoming obsessed with the can. // Turbo donates his race winnings an animal charity, but accidentally adopts a toad who moves into the clubhouse and becomes an obnoxious house guest.(n)

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Lair - D-Structs kidnaps Revvit to show the crew who's boss when they compete over construction, so Ty plans the perfect heist to rescue their friend.(n)

programme.title: Where'S Wally?
programme.desc: Little Trouble In Big China - It's the Lunar New Year and Odlulu has accidentally brought a stone dragon to life! Wally and Wenda work with local siblings Li and Liu, members of a dragon dance team, to tame the dragon and keep the celebration from being ruined.(n)

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magic Lantern - Rupert, Edward and Bill go camping. Rupert is excited at the idea of playing ‘explorers' but as darkness falls the friends are frightened by strange shadows and noises.(n)

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1
programme.desc: Rupert’S Treasure Hunt - Raggety is getting the wood tidy for the annual visit of the Spring Inspector. If it's not looking its best, Spring won't go ahead and Raggety needs help from Rupert and his friends.(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Noisy Present - Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Big Roar - Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?(n)

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!(n)

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!(n)

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots
programme.desc: Pip'S Playground - Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.(n)

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots
programme.desc: Mud Sculptures - It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?(n)

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1
programme.desc: The Hamazing Hamsterman - Dennis gets into a fluffy mess when he runs into Von Screwtop's Hadron Collider with the Professor’s pet hamster, Galahad. To stop Dennis from completely transforming into a hamster, the gang must sneak him into Wilbur’s lab to reverse the physical (and mental) reaction!(n)

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1
programme.desc: Prank Wars - Dennis discovers that Ralf, the janitor, is the legendary Prankmaster General and is told he could become his successor. Walter can’t let this happen and challenges him to a prank battle to win the infamous Prankypedia.(n)

programme.desc: Stink Of Fear: Chapter Five - When Fearless Leader brainwashes Bullwinkle, Rocky must team up with Director Peachfuzz to stop them from making the stinky pie and taking over the world.(n)

programme.desc: The Good Surprise/Nightmare On Eep Street - When Ugga's new surprise attack fails, and she comes home in a bad mood, Thunk tries to cure it by finding a happy surprise for his mom/ Eep stays up all night to see the mysterious and rare Night Mare (a horse with a rainbow mane) when she's teased for thinking they're not real.(n)

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Hen Pecks The Ground - You see there was a time when Hen didn't peck the ground. She was a proud mother who spent all her time looking after and cleaning her chicks. Fancy pancy Peacock upsets Mama Hen and makes her feel plain. All the animals are furious with Snooty Peacock… but the damage has been done. Eagle – Mama Hen's best friend – decides to lend Hen her most prized possession – A needle! And Mama Hen sews herself the most beautiful coat of new feathers. Everyone is delighted and they dance and dance and dance. But Mama Hen forgets all about the needle and it gets lost in all the dust. Eagle's precious needle! From that day on Hen always pecks the ground looking for the needle to return to her friend. Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Bat Hangs Upside Down - You see there was a time when Bat didn't hang upside down. He used to fly all over Tinga Tinga, saying ‘Boo!' to all the animals and giving them a fright. Nothing could be more fun for Bat. But one day Bat went too far… and the animals decided to give Bat a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The Case Of The Sleepy Toys - Everyone in Brickabuild keeps falling asleep and no one can get any building work finished. It's all because the lights keep coming on all night! Noddy decides to investigate who is turning the lights on. Bravely overcoming his own fear of the dark, he follows the clues to discover that the lights are being secretly turned on by a scared Carlton, who doesn't like the dark. Kind Noddy tells him that he's not the only one scared of the dark and after Carlton is given a cuddle device to cuddle, everyone can get a good night's sleep! Sleep tight, Noddy!(n)

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The Case Of The Secret Deliveries - Someone is giving presents to everyone in Toyland and all the toys want to say thank you but no one knows the identity of the secret gift giver! It's up to Noddy to investigate and find out who is it that's leaving presents for all the friends. By following clues and using his investigation skills, Noddy follows the trail to Animal Acres and discovers that Pat Pat and the Pockets are the secret gift-givers. Kind Noddy has a great idea and when Pat Pat makes her final delivery she finds a big pile of presents waiting for her from all her grateful friends. Thank you Pat Pat! And thank you Noddy!(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: Who Did I Hear In The Big Hollow Log? - Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,.(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: What Can We Do With Mimi'S Rubbish? - Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.(n)

programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Eco Igloo - Mrs Goggins is spearheading a recycling initiative “A Greener Greendale” but has been overwhelmed by donations of plastic bottles and compost. Meanwhile, Pat picks up today's special delivery - blocks of ice to make an igloo at the school for their North Pole project. Pat and Ajay struggle to get the slippery blocks into PAT2, then Pat and Jess must endure a journey with the air-con on full blast to keep the blocks frozen. Despite this, the ice starts to melt on the way to the Schoolhouse. PC Selby is getting concerned by the overflowing recycling and deems it a traffic hazard. Ted and Alf help collect the recycling early but some of the plastic bottles spill onto the road, causing a road jam that blocks Pat. By the time he gets the blocks to the schoolhouse there is nothing left but tiny ice cubes. The children are disappointed but Pat remembers thinking the plastic bottles in the road earlier were ice. He and Ted unload the recycling and Lauren and the children use the plastic bottles to make a much warmer igloo instead. Mission accomplished!(n)

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Reckless Rollers - Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!(n)

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03
programme.desc: Falcon Quest - In the sky above Animal Island, a remarkable race is about to begin. But before Blaze can join, he must spread his wings! Challenged by a tough-talking falcon, Blaze takes off on a journey to earn his place with the fast fliers!(n)

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04
programme.desc: Pups Save Francois the Penguin / Pups Save Daring Danny's Hippo - Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a carvasse. // Daring Danny wants a cool pet of his own, so he can't believe his luck when a stray baby hippo finds him.(n)

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04
programme.desc: Pups Save Baby Humdinger / Pups Save a Pinata - Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! Now it's up to the pups to find the special coconuut to reverse the spell. // Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay but is heartbroken when his special pinata mysteriously disappears.(n)

programme.title: Deer Squad S02
programme.desc: Cosmic Circus - Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely?(n)

programme.title: Deer Squad S02
programme.desc: Raining teddies / Party people - Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02
programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02
programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.(n)

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03
programme.desc: Come to Your Senses! - Oh no! Nonny broke his glasses! When they're fixed, Nonny is determined to retrieve them on his own. But to do it, he'll have to depend on his other four senses to reach the glasses store before it closes!(n)

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!(n)

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!(n)

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06
programme.desc: Race to Sky High Mountain - At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!(n)

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure Playoff - It's a special game show edition of Santiago of the Seas! Santiago, Tomas, and Lorelai have been trapped by Bonnie Bones and her crew. Play along to see if you have what it takes to set them free.(n)

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01
programme.desc: The Best Friends Game / The Fin-ale - When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV. // When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit.(n)

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01
programme.desc: Pups Save a Walrus - When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01
programme.desc: Paddington and the FIre Engine / Paddington Joins a Club - Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. programme.desc: The Library Badge - When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4)
programme.desc: Happy's First Day - Happy has always loved the water, even though it makes a mess. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water.(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4)

programme.desc: Cave of Crystals, Mexico - Can Glitch be saved from the Cave of Crystals, Mexico before things get too hot to handle?(n)

programme.desc: The Hunt For The Golden Treat - Gladdy sets the Numpups a challenge: to outwit her security measures and crack the code to retrieve the Golden Treat.(n)

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1)
programme.desc: Up High - The Teletubbies bounce on The Tubby Bouncy. Po bounces as high as a cloud, then Laa-Laa bounces higher, Dipsy bounces even higher and Tinky Winky bounces highest of all.(n)

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S4)
programme.desc: Scooter - Dee encourages a friend to say 'scooter' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different scooters - a purple scooter, a blue scooter and a bopping scooter.(n)

programme.title: Tinpo (S1)
programme.desc: Finn Fun - How can Logi-Po join in and play with his pet friend Finn the fish in just the same way that Tinpo plays with his hamster Herman?(n)

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1)
programme.desc: It's time for a spring clear out - JoJo and Gran Gran are having a spring clear out, but when Gran Gran wants to clear out her old jumper, JoJo is distraught - she loves that snuggly jumper!(n)

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1)
programme.desc: The Beautiful Game - Monty, Jimmy Jones and Stan are preparing to play a game of soccer, but when they realise they don't have the proper gear to play, Stan abandons the match, leaving Monty questioning whether you can only play a game if you have all the correct equipment.(n)

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1)
programme.desc: Half a Pair - After playing in the mud, Monty and Stan decide to give Jimmy Jones a bath, but when Stan can only find one glove from his pair, he tells Monty that half a pair of something is useless, leading Monty to wonder if there are any other uses for a half of a pair.(n)

programme.title: Bluey (S1)
programme.desc: Zoo - Bluey's backyard zoo is home to wonderful animals, especially the big blue Daddy gorilla. But when he grabs visitor Bingo and escapes, Zookeeper Bluey must recapture the wild beast.(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4)
